Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir,

While the police commander of this district was in the process of arresting some deserters from the 8th Corps of National Guards, he apprehended one from the 1st Line, whom I hereby send to Your Excellency, Francisco Fabiano da Silva, and I do not mention the battalion to which he belongs because he does not know it, or does not want to declare it. This is all I have to report and I have the honor to submit it to the respectable knowledge of Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency.
